articles.title: Niger coup: West Africa nations to assemble 'standby force' - BBC
articles.description: Ivory Coast's leader said the Ecowas bloc had approved military intervention "as soon as possible".
articles.content:
West African nations have approved armed intervention in Niger "as soon as possible", the Ivory Coast president says, following a meeting to discuss the coup.
At the meeting, leaders of the Ecowas r… [+2155 chars]

articles.title: Finally, someone said it: AB de Villiers thrilled as Harsha Bhogle plays down Tilak Varma 49 controversy - India Today
articles.description: West Indies vs India: Legendary South Africa batter AB de Villiers backed Harsha Bhogle's take on prioritising milestones in T20I cricket after Hardik Pandya faced flak for hitting a winning six in a T20I in Guyana that denied Tilak Varma an opportunity to co…
articles.content: Former South Africa batter AB de Villiers has backed celebrated broadcaster Harsha Bhogle's take on the 'obsession' with individual milestones in T20I cricket. Harsha Bhogle took to social media to s… [+1980 chars]
